[START maps_http_directions_boston_concord_waypoints_now]
https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/directions/json
  ?departure_time=now
  &destination=Concord%2C%20MA
  &origin=Boston%2C%20MA
  &waypoints=via%3ACharlestown%2CMA%7Cvia%3ALexington%2CMA
  &key=YOUR_API_KEY
[END maps_http_directions_boston_concord_waypoints_now]
